mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE username=#{username} and password=#{password}
SELECT * FROM user WHERE email=#{email} and password=#{password}

select G.id id,G.goods_name, G.price price,G.original original,G.content content, G.summary summary,B.brand_name brand_name,C.category_name category_name from zx_goods as G INNER join zx_brand as B on B.id=G.brand_id INNER join zx_categories as C on C.id=G.category_id where G.id=#{id};

select N.id id,N.property_name property_name,V.property_value property_value from zx_goods as G INNER join zx_goods_property as P on P.goods_id=G.id INNER join zx_property_name as N on N.id=P.property_name_id INNER join zx_property_value as V on V.id=P.property_value_id where G.id=#{id};
select I.id id,I.link link,I.position position from zx_goods as G INNER join zx_goods_images as I on I.goods_id=G.id where G.id=#{id} and is_master=0;

select N.id,N.property_name,V.property_value from zx_goods as G INNER join zx_goods_property as P on P.goods_id=G.id INNER join zx_property_name as N on N.id=P.property_name_id INNER join zx_property_value as V on V.id=P.property_value_id where G.id=#{id} and N.id=6;

select N.id,N.property_name,V.property_value from zx_goods as G INNER join zx_goods_property as P on P.goods_id=G.id INNER join zx_property_name as N on N.id=P.property_name_id INNER join zx_property_value as V on V.id=P.property_value_id where G.id=#{id} and N.id=1;
